page.title: 05The Post Office
page.content: Our village shop also runs a Post Office and this side of the business is most important. Pensions, Allow_ ances and Unemployment Benefit can all be collected; parcels and letters posted; and Savings Bank facilities used. One of the most important changes in recent years is the appear_ ance of the Giro Bank which provides people with an easy, efficient banking service free of charge. I believe the Village Shop and Post Office is more than a place of commerce. I like to think of it additionally as a meeting place for a friendly chat either with the staff or other customers. Here is an opportunity to compare notes about their children, their crops, their gardens or even about their husbands bad habits!
